title: Harmonie
synopsis: Akio Honjou is a high school student with a special gift for music. He can perfectly recall any piece of music that he has heard only once. One day, as he tries to reproduce a particularly soothing piano melody, he unexpectedly meets Juri Makinaâ€”the girl whose cell phone had spontaneously played the tune earlier in class.
